name: righteously
content:
Add to word list

in a way that is morally correct: They lived their life righteously. Try to judge everyone righteously, not just by a few things that you find as "negative points".
disapproving in a way that shows you believe you are morally correct: She righteously denies doing any wrong. In a situation like that, people get righteously upset. See
righteous
